pages.title: Diamond Armour
pages.text: To Make Infused Diamond Armour you will need one Infused Diamond per item you wish to make, a Diamond Piece of Armour matching that item and a Gem Upgrade Template.$(br)The Gem Upgrade Template goes in the First Slot, The Diamond Armour goes in the Second Slot and the Infused Diamond goes in the Third Slot

pages.title: Diamond Smithing
pages.text: Equip a Full set of Infused Diamond Armour to Gain a Permenant Resistance Boost
